channel.title: [508] Smithing [508]
channel.description: Well, im new to 508's. But know, i see on the source i downloaded (Server made from Bulby) that you can only smelt ores, but not making bars with it. Maybe this isn't easy, but can anyone tell me how to make the smithing interface and that it will pop-up when u use a bar on an anvil?

item.title: [508] Smithing [508]
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_k4t3 0wn3r k4t3
item.description:
@0wn3r_k4t3 wrote:

Why make it so if you click a bronze bar on a anvil it will add a random bronze item and give exp
